data.title: A CROSS-CULTURAL STUDY ON WEATHER PROVERBS IN ENGLISH AND VIETNAMESE. Đỗ Thị Minh Ngọc. QHF.1.2006
data.meta_description: A CROSS-CULTURAL STUDY ON WEATHER PROVERBS IN ENGLISH AND VIETNAMESE. Đỗ Thị Minh Ngọc. QHF.1.2006 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf) or view presentation slides online. This document presents a graduation paper on a cross-cultural study of weather proverbs in English and Vietnamese. The paper aims to investigate weather proverbs in the two languages to find cultural similarities and differences. It employs qualitative methods to analyze weather proverbs collected from various sources. The analysis reveals differences in the images and concepts used in English and Vietnamese weather proverbs, reflecting differences in attitudes towards nature and its influence on lives and economies between the two cultures. Teaching weather proverbs can enhance understanding of cultural aspects of the languages.
data.text: A CROSS-CULTURAL STUDY ON WEATHER PROVERBS IN ENGLISH AND VIETNAMESE. Đỗ Thị Minh Ngọc. QHF.1.2006
